metadata.feature_description: Configure whether comments require approval before publication for Blogs, Discussions, Ideas, Social Events, and Wiki modules.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Enable comment moderation for Blogs module

steps.action: Navigate to Community Settings > Settings tab
steps.expected: Comment Moderation section visible with Blogs checkbox
steps.actual: Comment Moderation section displayed with all five module checkboxes (Blogs, Discussions, Ideas, Social Events, Wiki)

steps.action: Click Blogs checkbox to enable comment moderation

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Disable comment moderation for Blogs module

steps.action: Click Blogs checkbox to disable comment moderation

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Enable comment moderation for Discussions module

steps.action: Click Discussions checkbox to enable comment moderation

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Disable comment moderation for Discussions module

steps.action: Click Discussions checkbox to disable comment moderation

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Enable comment moderation for Ideas module

steps.action: Click Ideas checkbox to enable comment moderation

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Enable comment moderation for Social Events module

steps.action: Click Social Events checkbox to enable comment moderation

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Enable comment moderation for Wiki module

steps.action: Click Wiki checkbox to enable comment moderation

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Save all comment moderation settings and verify persistence

steps.action: Enable Ideas, Social Events, and Wiki checkboxes, then click Save
Navigate away from Community Settings (to Dashboard)
Navigate back to Community Settings and verify checkboxes retain their state
steps.expected: Ideas, Social Events, and Wiki checkboxes should remain checked
steps.actual: All Comment Moderation checkboxes (Blogs, Discussions, Ideas, Social Events, Wiki) are unchecked - settings did NOT persist after navigation

issues: Comment Moderation settings do not persist after navigating away from the Community Settings page. The save operation appears to succeed (success notification shown), but the checkbox states revert to default (all unchecked) upon returning to the page.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify default values (all false) for new installations

steps.action: Check initial state of Comment Moderation checkboxes
steps.expected: All checkboxes should be unchecked by default
steps.actual: All Comment Moderation checkboxes (Blogs, Discussions, Ideas, Social Events, Wiki) are unchecked by default

observations: Comment Moderation settings appear to have a persistence issue - while the UI allows enabling/disabling checkboxes and shows success notifications when saving, the settings do not persist when navigating away and returning to the page.

In contrast, the nearby Content Moderation settings (Answers, Discussions, Ideas, Social Events) DO appear to persist correctly, suggesting this may be a specific issue with the Comment Moderation feature implementation.
The default values (all false/unchecked) match the expected behavior for new installations.
